00019 #ifndef _PROCESSOR_REGISTRY_HPP_cm130110_
00020 #define _PROCESSOR_REGISTRY_HPP_cm130110_
00021 
00022 #include <map>
00023 #include <string>
00024 
00025 #include <boost/function.hpp>
00026 #include <boost/functional/factory.hpp>
00027 #include <boost/property_tree/ptree.hpp>
00028 #include <boost/shared_ptr.hpp>
00029 
00030 #include "processor.hpp"
00031 
00032 namespace processor {
00034   class registry {
00035   public:
00036     typedef boost::function<base::sptr(const boost::property_tree::ptree&)> a_factory;
00037     typedef std::map<std::string, a_factory> map_type;
00038 
00039     registry() {}
00040 
00042     static base::sptr make(std::string key, const boost::property_tree::ptree& config) {
00043       map_type::iterator i(map().find(key));
00044       if (i == map().end())
00045         return base::sptr();
00046       return i->second(config);
00047     }
00048 
00050     template<typename T>
00051     static void add(std::string key) {
00052       map()[key] = boost::factory<typename T::sptr>();
00053     }
00054 
00055     static map_type& map() { return map_; }
00056     static map_type map_;
00057   private:
00058   } ;
00059 
00060 } // namespace processor
00061 
00062 #endif // _PROCESSOR_REGISTRY_HPP_cm130110_
